quote.issuer_name: China Beidahuang Industry Group Holdings Ltd.
quote.nm: China Beidahuang Industry Group Holdings Ltd.
quote.summary: China Beidahuang Industry Group Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the trading of food products. The Company operates through six segments. The Trading of food products is engaged in the wholesaling and retailing of staple food, cooking oil, alcohol and beverage, frozen and fresh food, commodity hog and others. The Rental segment is engaged in the leasing of logistic facilities and office facilities. The Minera Products segment is engaged in the flotation selection of non-ferrous metals mines and sales of mineral products. The Financial Leasing segment is engaged in the provision of financial leasing services. The Wine and Liquor segment is engaged in the sales and distribution of wine and liquor. The Construction and Development segment is engaged in the construction and land development.
quote.office_address:
